meanings.definition: The period of time following the regular season in sports, typically involving playoff games or series.
meanings.sent1: During the postseasons, teams compete to become the champions.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly await the postseasons to see which team will win.
meanings.sent3: The postseasons are like the exciting final chapter of a book.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the postseasons are the ultimate test of skill and determination.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere during the postseasons is electric with anticipation and tension.

meanings.definition: The series of games or events that take place after the regular season to determine a champion.
meanings.sent1: The postseasons are where teams battle it out for the championship title.
meanings.sent2: Every player dreams of competing in the postseasons and winning it all.
meanings.sent3: Watching the postseasons feels like being on a thrilling rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: The postseasons separate the good teams from the great ones.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of the postseasons can be felt both on and off the field.
